channel.title: GMT / whoer.net / mismatch
channel.description: Hi guys, I have the time via proxy (anonymox plugin) in browser [img]http://i11.pixs.ru/storage/8/7/0/defaultpng_4957086_19194870.png[/img] [img]http://i11.pixs.ru/storage/8/8/6/defaultpng_7130388_19194886.png[/img] It's mismatch. Wft? =) Someone can give a guide how to configure a match? Thanks.

item.title: GMT / whoer.net / mismatch
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Don’t use that add-on.
It is recommended to use plain Tor Browser. (https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tor_Browser)

Not every message some random page outputs is to be taken serious. It compares the time zone of the Tor exit with your local time zone. If you are using a different circuit [exiting the Tor network from a different time zone], it will show a different “mismatch”.

In short: use Tor Browser and leave this as is.

Read full topic

item.title: GMT / whoer.net / mismatch
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

not sure, what you want to accomplish, as Whonix always uses the UTC to prevent time zone leaks, as explained on multiple occasions, like here: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Post_Install_Advice#Network_Time_Syncing

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic
